body: I got a lot of spare time on my hands and looking to binge watch some series, currently I've watched Heros, Dexter, 4400, Lost, Breaking Bad, Weeds, Prison Break, and Stranger Things. Any type of movie/series is acceptable. Thanks

replies.body:
LOST - plane crashes on mysterious island with people trying to get off and on the island

pros:
* makes connections to previous episodes like doctor who does
* time travel
* violence/murder
* redemption
* 6 seasons

cons:
* dialogue can get boring at times (watch with closed captions)
* some characters are idiots

Overall rating - 8/10
